verses.verse: אֵ֠לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh These הַֽחֻקִּ֣ים <S%H2706><s%> ha-chuk-Kim These [are] the statutes וְהַמִּשְׁפָּטִים֮ <S%H4941><s%> ve-ham-mish-pa-Tim and judgments אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which תִּשְׁמְר֣וּן <S%H8104><s%> tish-me-Run which ye shall observe לַעֲשׂוֹת֒ <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-sOt to do בָּאָ֕רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz in the land אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which נָתַ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> na-Tan giveth יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֧י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei God אֲבֹתֶ֛יךָ <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-Tei-cha of thy fathers לְךָ֖ le-Cha לְרִשְׁתָּ֑הּ <S%H3423><s%> le-rish-Tah; thee to possess כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַיָּמִ֔ים <S%H3117><s%> hai-ya-Mim, it all the days אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which אַתֶּ֥ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem you חַיִּ֖ים <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yim that ye live עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on הָאֲדָמָֽה׃ <S%H127><s%> ha-'a-da-Mah. upon the earth

אַבֵּ֣ד <S%H6><s%> 'ab-Bed Ye shall utterly תְּ֠אַבְּדוּן <S%H6><s%> Te-'ab-be-dun destroy אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַמְּקֹמ֞וֹת <S%H4725><s%> ham-me-ko-Mot all the places אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עָֽבְדוּ־ <S%H5647><s%> 'a-ve-du- served שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> sham in it הַגּוֹיִ֗ם <S%H1471><s%> hag-go-Yim, wherein the nations אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom אַתֶּ֛ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem you יֹרְשִׁ֥ים <S%H3423><s%> yo-re-Shim ye shall possess אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Hem; their gods עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and הֶהָרִ֤ים <S%H2022><s%> he-ha-Rim mountains הָֽרָמִים֙ <S%H7311><s%> ha-ra-Mim upon the high וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- and on הַגְּבָע֔וֹת <S%H1389><s%> hag-ge-va-'ot, and upon the hills וְתַ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> ve-Ta-chat and under כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- every עֵ֥ץ <S%H6086><s%> 'etz tree רַעֲנָן׃ <S%H7488><s%> ra-'a-nan and under every green

וְנִתַּצְתֶּ֣ם <S%H5422><s%> ve-nit-tatz-Tem And ye shall overthrow אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מִזְבּחֹתָ֗ם <S%H4196><s%> miz-b-cho-Tam, their altars וְשִׁבַּרְתֶּם֙ <S%H7665><s%> ve-shib-bar-Tem and break אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מַצֵּ֣בֹתָ֔ם <S%H4676><s%> matz-Tze-vo-Tam, their pillars וַאֲשֵֽׁרֵיהֶם֙ <S%H842><s%> va-'a-she-rei-Hem their groves תִּשְׂרְפ֣וּן <S%H8313><s%> tis-re-Fun and burn בָּאֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> ba-'Esh, with fire וּפְסִילֵ֥י <S%H6456><s%> u-fe-si-Lei the graven images אֱלֹֽהֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Hem of their gods תְּגַדֵּע֑וּן <S%H1438><s%> te-gad-de-'Un; and ye shall hew down וְאִבַּדְתֶּ֣ם <S%H6><s%> ve-'ib-bad-Tem and destroy אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׁמָ֔ם <S%H8034><s%> she-Mam, the names מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- that הַמָּק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> ham-ma-Kom of them out of that place הַהֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu. he

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- shall not תַעֲשׂ֣וּן <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Sun Ye shall not do so כֵּ֔ן <S%H3651><s%> Ken, like לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Chem. your God

כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אִֽם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- lo אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַמָּק֞וֹם <S%H4725><s%> ham-ma-Kom But unto the place אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which יִבְחַ֨ר <S%H977><s%> yiv-Char shall choose יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶם֙ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Chem your God מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> mik-kol all שִׁבְטֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H7626><s%> shiv-tei-Chem, out of all your tribes לָשׂ֥וּם <S%H7760><s%> la-Sum to put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mo his name שָׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> Sham; there לְשִׁכְנ֥וֹ <S%H7933><s%> le-shich-No there [even] unto his habitation תִדְרְשׁ֖וּ <S%H1875><s%> tid-re-Shu shall ye seek וּבָ֥אתָ <S%H935><s%> u-Va-ta and thither thou shalt come שָֽׁמָּה׃ <S%H8033><s%> Sham-mah. and there

וַהֲבֵאתֶ֣ם <S%H935><s%> va-ha-ve-Tem And thither ye shall bring שָׁ֗מָּה <S%H8033><s%> Sham-mah, There עֹלֹֽתֵיכֶם֙ <S%H5930><s%> 'o-lo-tei-Chem your burnt offerings וְזִבְחֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H2077><s%> ve-ziv-chei-Chem, and your sacrifices וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et מַעְשְׂרֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H4643><s%> ma'-se-Ro-tei-Chem, and your tithes וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et תְּרוּמַ֣ת <S%H8641><s%> te-ru-Mat and heave offerings יֶדְכֶ֑ם <S%H3027><s%> yed-Chem; of your hand וְנִדְרֵיכֶם֙ <S%H5088><s%> ve-nid-rei-Chem and your vows וְנִדְבֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H5071><s%> ve-nid-Vo-tei-Chem, and your freewill offerings וּבְכֹרֹ֥ת <S%H1062><s%> u-ve-cho-Rot and the firstlings בְּקַרְכֶ֖ם <S%H1241><s%> be-kar-Chem of your herds וְצֹאנְכֶֽם׃ <S%H6629><s%> ve-tzo-ne-Chem. and of your flocks

וַאֲכַלְתֶּם־ <S%H398><s%> va-'a-chal-tem- And there ye shall eat שָׁ֗ם <S%H8033><s%> Sham, There לִפְנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Chem, your God וּשְׂמַחְתֶּ֗ם <S%H8055><s%> u-se-mach-Tem, and ye shall rejoice בְּכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> be-Chol all מִשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H4916><s%> mish-Lach in all that ye put יֶדְכֶ֔ם <S%H3027><s%> yed-Chem, your hand אַתֶּ֖ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem you וּבָתֵּיכֶ֑ם <S%H1004><s%> u-vat-tei-Chem; unto ye and your households אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which בֵּֽרַכְךָ֖ <S%H1288><s%> be-rach-Cha hath blessed יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh wherein the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha. thy God

לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo shall not תַעֲשׂ֔וּן <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Sun, Ye shall not do כְּ֠כֹל <S%H3605><s%> Ke-chol all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher what אֲנַ֧חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> 'a-Nach-nu we עֹשִׂ֛ים <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Sim after all [the things] that we do פֹּ֖ה <S%H6311><s%> poh here הַיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom; here this day אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish every man כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- whatever הַיָּשָׁ֥ר <S%H3477><s%> hai-ya-Shar whatsoever [is] right בְּעֵינָֽיו׃ <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nav. in his own eyes

כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not בָּאתֶ֖ם <S%H935><s%> ba-Tem For ye are not as yet come עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- as עָ֑תָּה <S%H6258><s%> 'At-tah; yet אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַמְּנוּחָה֙ <S%H4496><s%> ham-me-nu-Chah to the rest וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and to הַֽנַּחֲלָ֔ה <S%H5159><s%> han-na-cha-Lah, and to the inheritance אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha your God נֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> no-Ten giveth לָֽךְ׃ Lach.

וַעֲבַרְתֶּם֮ <S%H5674><s%> va-'a-var-Tem But [when] ye go over אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַיַּרְדֵּן֒ <S%H3383><s%> hai-yar-Den Jordan וִֽישַׁבְתֶּ֣ם <S%H3427><s%> vi-shav-Tem and dwell בָּאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz, in the land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Chem your God מַנְחִ֣יל <S%H5157><s%> man-Chil giveth you to inherit אֶתְכֶ֑ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem; וְהֵנִ֨יחַ <S%H5117><s%> ve-he-Ni-ach and [when] he giveth you rest לָכֶ֧ם la-Chem מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> mik-kol all אֹיְבֵיכֶ֛ם <S%H341><s%> 'o-ye-vei-Chem from all your enemies מִסָּבִ֖יב <S%H5439><s%> mis-sa-Viv round about וִֽישַׁבְתֶּם־ <S%H3427><s%> vi-shav-tem- so that ye dwell בֶּֽטַח׃ <S%H983><s%> Be-tach. in safety

וְהָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah shall come הַמָּק֗וֹם <S%H4725><s%> ham-ma-Kom, Then there shall be a place אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which יִבְחַר֩ <S%H977><s%> yiv-Char shall choose יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֥ם <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Chem your God בּוֹ֙ bo לְשַׁכֵּ֤ן <S%H7931><s%> le-shak-Ken to dwell שְׁמוֹ֙ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mo to cause his name שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> Sham, there שָׁ֣מָּה <S%H8033><s%> Sham-mah there תָבִ֔יאוּ <S%H935><s%> ta-Vi-'u, there thither shall ye bring אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> 'et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which אָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I מְצַוֶּ֣ה <S%H6680><s%> me-tzav-Veh all that I command אֶתְכֶ֑ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem; עוֹלֹתֵיכֶ֣ם <S%H5930><s%> o-lo-tei-Chem you your burnt offerings וְזִבְחֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H2077><s%> ve-ziv-chei-Chem, and your sacrifices מַעְשְׂרֹֽתֵיכֶם֙ <S%H4643><s%> ma'-se-ro-tei-Chem your tithes וּתְרֻמַ֣ת <S%H8641><s%> u-te-ru-Mat and the heave offering יֶדְכֶ֔ם <S%H3027><s%> yed-Chem, of your hand וְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> ve-Chol and all מִבְחַ֣ר <S%H4005><s%> miv-Char and all your choice נִדְרֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H5088><s%> nid-rei-Chem, vows אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher] which תִּדְּר֖וּ <S%H5087><s%> tid-de-Ru] which ye vow לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh.] unto the LORD

וּשְׂמַחְתֶּ֗ם <S%H8055><s%> u-se-mach-Tem, And ye shall rejoice לִפְנֵי֮ <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶם֒ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Chem your God אַתֶּ֗ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem, you וּבְנֵיכֶם֙ <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-nei-Chem ye and your sons וּבְנֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H1323><s%> u-ve-No-tei-Chem, and your daughters וְעַבְדֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H5650><s%> ve-'av-dei-Chem and your menservants וְאַמְהֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H519><s%> ve-'am-ho-tei-Chem; and your maidservants וְהַלֵּוִי֙ <S%H3881><s%> ve-hal-le-Vi and the Levite אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who בְּשַֽׁעֲרֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H8179><s%> be-sha-'a-rei-Chem, that [is] within your gates כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki forasmuch אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein has ל֛וֹ lo חֵ֥לֶק <S%H2506><s%> Che-lek as he hath no part וְנַחֲלָ֖ה <S%H5159><s%> ve-na-cha-Lah nor inheritance אִתְּכֶֽם׃ <S%H854><s%> 'it-te-Chem. for

הִשָּׁ֣מֶר <S%H8104><s%> hish-Sha-mer Take heed לְךָ֔ le-Cha, פֶּֽן־ <S%H6435><s%> pen- not תַּעֲלֶ֖ה <S%H5927><s%> ta-'a-Leh to thyself that thou offer עֹלֹתֶ֑יךָ <S%H5930><s%> 'o-lo-Tei-cha; not thy burnt offerings בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol every מָק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> ma-Kom in every place אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher you תִּרְאֶֽה׃ <S%H7200><s%> tir-'Eh. that thou seest

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- but בַּמָּק֞וֹם <S%H4725><s%> bam-ma-Kom But in the place אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which יִבְחַ֤ר <S%H977><s%> yiv-Char shall choose יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD בְּאַחַ֣ד <S%H259><s%> be-'a-Chad in one שְׁבָטֶ֔יךָ <S%H7626><s%> she-va-Tei-cha, of thy tribes שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> sham there תַּעֲלֶ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> ta-'a-Leh there thou shalt offer עֹלֹתֶ֑יךָ <S%H5930><s%> 'o-lo-Tei-cha; thy burnt offerings וְשָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> ve-Sham and there תַּעֲשֶׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Seh, and there thou shalt do כֹּ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> kol all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which אָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I מְצַוֶּֽךָּ׃ <S%H6680><s%> me-tzav-Ve-ka. all that I command
